nl_clear_tip: This will clear all content from the axis. "Clear all"?
nl_operation_tip_content1: Scroll the mouse wheel/two-fingers to zoom in on the axis
nl_operation_tip_content2: Drag the green dots on either end to adjust the length of the axis
nl_operation_tip_content3: Drag the green dot in the middle to adjust the length of the grid
nl_operation_tip_content4: Hold down on the middle of the green dot below the number to modify the scale value
nl_mark_max_tip: A maximum of 10 marks can be created
nl_interval_max_tip: A maximum of 10 intervals can be created
nl_regulation_max_tip: A maximum of 10 regulations can be created
nl_range_max_tip: The axis scale should be between 0.1-1000
nl_mark_same_tip: If the same marks are found, please modify
nl_interval_empty_tip: The intersection of all intervals added is Ã˜ (empty)
